## getType() function

Gets underlying type for Type and NotType

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getType<TType>(type: Type<TType>): Type<TType>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | Type&lt;TType&gt; | Type that is going to be used for extraction |

<b>Returns:</b>

Type&lt;TType&gt;
